input.sentences: a large crowd had gathered for the planned concert .
nearby | an art display made a welcome diversion during the wait .
some of the younger crowd members started to get restless .
the band finally took stage and began to sound check .
after a brief practice period | the band dove right in to their set .
output.sentences: The band had planned to practice when the crowd gathered.
There was a nearby diversion while they waited.
The crowd was getting restless and started cheering.
Some sound was finally coming from the stage.
The set was going to practice for a period.
